name: HSP_CLP_CMS_TX_PIECES
description: This table contains the hospital transactions that were used in the creation of CMS claim lines in Hospital Billing.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the claim line in the claim record.

columns.name: TX_PIECE
columns.description: The index of the transaction for the claim line.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: ID of the hospital transaction used in the creation of this claim line.
